name: Not On My Planet
description:
Help to pick up litter on the beach! If not, the giant monster (Globby Warmer) will eat the litter and then eat you too :(

WASD/Arrow keys to move, Space to pick up litter and interact!

Submission for UC Berkeley Bear Jams Fall 2019.

Made in 40 hours (with ample sleep!) by:
Character and Prop Art: Chia Wei Ting (Singapore, Nanyang Technological University)
Environment Art: Gabby Delforge (UC Berkeley)
Programming and Audio: Jireh Chew (Singapore, Nanyang Technological University)
Climate Activist and Badass: Greta Thunberg

All songs credited to:

 Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
